title: Paradise lost: a film from the painting of Hieronymus Bosch, 1462-1516
creator_credit: Enrico Gras, Luciano Emmer, Salvo D'Angelo, Colonna Film and Panda Film
brief_description: The paintings of the famous Dutch artist, Hieronymus Bosch set to music and story narration. Conveys the atmosphere of the strange world of this extraordinary painter in great detail. Close-ups are used continuously to show the highly imaginative works of minute detail: Adam and Eve in the Garden of Eden; the Temptation and the Fall.
